channel.title: Version 7.5 :: Hugo Relearn Theme
channel.description: 7.5.0 (2025-03-04) Enhancements [feature][change] rtl: fix alignment of buttons #1039 [feature] code: add copy-to-clipboard to pre-only elements #1036 Fixes [bug] code: fixing negative margin on inline clipboard #1038 [bug] tooltip: make font reliable #1037 [bug] code: avoid inline code to display above sticky table headers #1035 Maintenance [task] openapi: update swagger-ui to 5.19.0 #1041 [task][change] theme: move dependencies from static to assets #1040
